title: Is Autofill always on?
body:
I'm doing my placements,  and its Autofill/ProtectedX2/Autofill
Is there anytime Autofill isnt active in solo Q? Currently queued against B1/S5
so 75%ish of the population..

Also did riot ever release the differences in win rate between
Primary role and Autofilled? I know they said there's only a tiny 
difference between Secondary role win rates and Autofill, and
that there was a measurable difference between Primary and Auto,
but I wonder if there's any %'s?

replies.body:
I saw this riot (click the icon below) saying you have a 1/20 chance of getting autofilled, can anyone tell me their experience?

Obviously I've just started ranked but it seems like 
Autofill/ProtectedX2/Autofill/ProtectedX2/Autofill..


https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5euwdk/the_changes_to_autofill_result_in_role_weighting/dah0js7/

> [{quoted}](name=Revelstoke,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E23Ohmsh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-22T06:24:50.790+0000)
>
> I saw this riot saying you have a 1/20 chance of getting autofilled, can anyone tell me their experience?
> 
> Obviously I've just started ranked but it seems like 
> Autofill/ProtectedX2/Autofill/ProtectedX2/Autofill..
> 
> 
> https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5euwdk/the_changes_to_autofill_result_in_role_weighting/dah0js7/

I never count it personally per se. But I mainly queue for top and jg and from my memory, I have only been given something not those 2 for like 4 or 5 times out of my 20 something  (or 30 something) ranked games played.

That said, I think the chance is not equal for all players and that 1/20 is just an average from all players maybe. Because if you typically queue for high-demand positions like mid then obviously you are going to get autofilled more than say when you queue for top, which is the second least popular position afaik (and if you always queue for supp, you pretty much will never get autofilled into other positions).

There was a time when there's no Autofill, it was before its introduction though.

But understand that Autofill is necessary, because without it, queue times can literally be hours long even in Bronze and Silver and no one wants to deal with it.
